testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: When I click the Feedback tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: And I click Feedback Editor button to open the Math Editor dialog and assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: And I type "a/b" in the Equation Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: And I click Done in the Math Editor dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: Then I see a Math Widget in the Feedback Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: And I click Cancel
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: Then I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog and creating some math when Editing Response Area

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts and cancelling with the keyboard ?[90m# MathEditorDialog.feature:46?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.chooseCreatingNewQuestionFromMainDropdownButton()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mQuestion Designer is opened?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertQuestionDesignerPageIsOpened()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click inside the question text editor?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickInsideQuestionTextEditor()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI type the keyboard shortcut to open the Math Editor and assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.openMathEditorWithKeyboard()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI type "?[0m?[32m?[1ma/b?[0m?[32m" in the Equation Editor?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorDialogSteps.typeText(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI cancel the dialog with the keyboard shortcut?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorDialogSteps.cancelDialogWithKeyboard()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI don't see the "?[0m?[32m?[1ma/b?[0m?[32m" Math Widget in the question text section?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertMathWidgetIsNotInserted(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI click the question designer Save & Close button?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickSaveAndCloseButton()?[0m
